level.heading: PORTABLE FUEL CONTAINERS AND SPOUTS – CERTIFICATION AND COMPLIANCE TESTROCEDURES (§ 20-755)

level.text: Testing to determine compliance with § 752 shall be performed by using test procedures specified in “CP-501, Certification Procedure for Portable Fuel Containers and Spill-Proof Spouts,” adopted by CARB on July 26, 2006, including any subsequent amendments, which are incorporated by reference herein.
Alternative methods that are shown to be accurate, precise, and appropriate may be used upon written approval of the Department.
Test procedures referred to in this section can be obtained from the Department and may be available at http://www.arb.ca.gov.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 11286, 11368 (December 30, 2011).
